name: Saigon Twilight With Vespa
description:
By means of Vespa, the most
elegant of all scooters, you will discover all the sights of Ho Chi Minh City
in the late afternoon. A ride around the city downtown passing Notre Dame
Cathedral, City Post Office, City Hall, and Saigon River will offer you a
deeper sight about  a vital economic hub, the new and the old. You will
hear, taste and feel about Saigonese daily life when passing the Thu Thiem
Tunnel to reach the other part of the city. Last stop is at one of the
skyscrapers to enjoy the panoramic view of the night city. Delicious local food
and famous coffee shop are also included to enrich your adventure. What better
way to see Ho Chi Minh City than on the back of a Vespa? Join us now
